snippet.title: Elevator Hitch | RPG Maker Horror | No Commentary
snippet.description:
*The end is a bit messed up. I just tried to check something and editing it out was kind of a pain so I didn't bother. After credits, it's okay to leave. There's nothing of importance. I apologize for the mistake.*

Game: Elevator Hitch
Find the game here: https://racheldrawsthis.itch.io/elevator-hitch
Original creator: STUDIO INVESTIGRAVE ( racheldrawsthis )
Release Date: 2022
Engine: RPG Maker MV
I do NOT own anything on this video, all credit to their respective creators.

If the creator wants me to take this down, please tell me.

Endings Gotten: 14/15 (...I missed one condition for the 15th. Sorry)

" 70s office elevator themed surreal horror / escape room visual novel " -dev's site

Good game. I'll say first and foremost. I've seen this sort of concept of trying different things and dying horribly to most of them even in RPG Maker. And it's fun. Art is good, there isn't much of a story I think but the writing is also fun and this is certainly the goriest of this creator's games that are currently out. But that's fun every once in a while.

The worst part was me having to record this in 5 parts because my computer does not like mv games apparently. No big deal now but eh. Fun game. I liked it. 

But technically this is the worst game of all time since I had to kill a rat. If there was commentary you could audibly hear me say "NOOOOOOO" when I realized I had to kill it. (joking. obviously. It's the second worst. (jk))

Fun game, liked it. I'm looking forward to whatever the creator makes next.

short rpg maker horror game, escape room, escape game, time loop, visual novel

(trying to get some tags in the description. my bad. Just trying out stuff.)
